title: Oil prices rise after Trump says a 'massive Armada is heading to Iran'
summary_full: U.S. Central Command said Monday that the Abraham Lincoln Carrier Strike Group had arrived in the Middle East.
summary_public: U.S. Central Command said Monday that the Abraham Lincoln Carrier Strike Group had arrived in the Middle East.
